ch0096_00_zumi/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been expecting you.
ch0096_00_zumi/0101_0701_02_10:
You mustn’t let the day go to waste if you
mean to bring out the best in your
Pokémon. Chop-chop!
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_01_10:
There’s one ingredient that is guaranteed
to make any recipe tastier.
Do you know what it is?
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_03_10:
Enjoying a meal with a smile on your face
makes everything taste that much more
delicious, don’t you think?
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_04_10:
Watching others enjoy a meal you prepared
is the greatest happiness of all for a
chef like myself.
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_05_10:
You should always endeavor to do your
very best in order to bring happiness
to yourself and the people around you.
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_01_10:
At times, I tend to stress myself out over a lot
of things... But you know, not every problem
has a definite answer.
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_02_10:
That’s why it feels so good when you find
your own way to solve things.
It’s a different sort of happiness.
ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_03_10:
Both cooking and Pokémon training have so
many deep layers. We could continue to learn
about them forever—and we should!
ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard some people call me
a legendary chef.
ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_02_10:
But truthfully, I don’t think that
moniker is entirely accurate.
ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_03_10:
There is still so much more that I can
learn and endeavor to achieve.
ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_04_10:
I strive to elevate my cooking and my
Pokémon battles to a level of true art!
They must be masterpieces!
ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0702_01_10:
When I’m defeated in a Pokémon battle,
I feel that my own weakness is to blame.
ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0702_02_10:
I need to draw out the absolute best in my
Pokémon, or I’ll never achieve my goals.
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_01_10:
I met my Clawitzer when he was still a
Clauncher, and he’s been my most dependable
front-liner ever since.
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_02_10:
It was a bit shocking how we first met, actually.
I still remember it clearly to this day...
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_03_10:
You see, Clauncher somehow got mixed in
with some ingredients I had procured for a
recipe of mine.
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_04_10:
After I’d gotten over my initial shock,
I thought to myself, this Pokémon would
really shine in a battle!
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_05_10:
Finding Clauncher among my ingredients that day
and making that immediate judgment set things
in motion for the long term.
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0702_01_10:
And you know, if you really think about it,
it wasn’t I who found Clawitzer...
ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0702_02_10: It was Clawitzer who found me.
ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_01_10:
Once, I decided to leave Kalos and go on
a journey to discover the ultimate recipe.
ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_02_10:
I was fishing one day and caught a
Magikarp, but it was no ordinary Magikarp.
I felt immense potential within it.
ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_03_10:
Eventually I learned that my instincts were
correct. It more than lived up to my expectations.
ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_04_10:
When it evolved into Gyarados, the pair of
us conquered many a rough wave together.
ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0702_01_10: Potential is something that lies hidden within.
ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0702_02_10:
Drawing out that hidden flicker of light
is the job of every Trainer—as well as the
job of a world-class chef.
ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad that we had the opportunity
to meet, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_02_10:
You are a Trainer that possesses the
ability to draw out the most amazing
potential in your Pokémon.
ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_03_10:
I firmly believe that you have a
bright future ahead of you.
There’s so much you will accomplish.
ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0702_01_10:
Your strength as a Trainer is directly
related to your ability to bring out the
best in your Pokémon.
ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0702_02_10:
Remember that, and I’m positive you’ll
continue to grow even stronger.
ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something interesting while I was
cleaning up the kitchen. Here, take it.
ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0701_02_10:
I’m certain you won’t let a fine item
like this go to waste.
ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0702_01_10:
Both Trainers and chefs should endeavor
to make the most of the raw materials
they start with!
ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find anything else you might like,
I’ll be sure to send it your way.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_01_10:
The art of cooking and Pokémon battling
are both beautiful in their impermanence.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_02_10:
The end result may only last for a short
while, but it takes a great amount of time
and devotion to get up to that point.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_03_10:
That brief moment feels special because of
all that time spent earnestly debating,
researching, learning, and practicing.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_04_10:
One could call it a compilation of their life.
That’s why we must always do the very best
we can.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_01_10:
Our Pokémon are always inching closer
and closer into our hearts.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m constantly tackling my own worries
and stress for that reason.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_03_10:
When I do, we all end up feeling
a little bit happier.
ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_04_10:
To be truly happy, we must continually
devote ourselves.
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_01_10:
You know, when it comes to Pokémon battling,
you help me out in a myriad of ways.
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_02_10:
I’d like to treat you to a delicious meal.
One that I’ve poured my heart and soul into.
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_03_10:
This conundrum I’ve been going back and
forth over—whether or not Pokémon battles
are worthy of being called art...
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_04_10:
I’d like you to taste my food—my art—
and tell me what you think the answer to
that question is.
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_01_10:
In essence, the art of cooking and
Pokémon battling are one and the same.
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_02_10:
The quality of the ingredients, the skill of
one’s Pokémon... Drawing out the best of each
will take you to greater heights.
ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_03_10:
I know that you have great effort and
true skill. That’s why I feel I can ask
you this question.
ch0096_00_zumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning.
Have you eaten a well-rounded breakfast?
It’s the most important meal of the day.
ch0096_00_zumi/3002_0701_01_10:
A new dawn, a new day. One should savor
every last moment lest tomorrow never come.
ch0096_00_zumi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello! Did you have a nice lunch?
One is not living if one is not enjoying food.
ch0096_00_zumi/3004_0701_01_10:
Hohoho! What shall I cook for dinner tonight?
I’ll need to stock up on ingredients.
ch0096_00_zumi/3005_0701_01_10:
A tip: Try chewing your food slowly,
and really savor the flavor.
That always gives me a boost of motivation!
ch0096_00_zumi/3006_0701_01_10:
Remember to get a good night’s sleep tonight
so that you’re ready for tomorrow’s adventures.
